name: Curved Gaming Monitor Acer Nitro ED270R 27" (UM.HE0EE.P01) - Black
origAbout: Take your first step into gaming with an ED0 series monitor. With curved Full HD screen combined with AMD FreeSync™ technology, a 165Hz refresh rate, 5ms response time, and ZeroFrame design to enhance the experience of all your gaming sessions. Every AMD FreeSync™ monitor goes through a rigorous certification process to ensure a tear free, low latency experience. No tearing. No stuttering. Just gaming. AMD FreeSync technology puts an end to choppy gameplay and broken frames with fluid, artifact-free performance at virtually any framerate. Behold the next breakthrough in PC and console gaming experiences.
